GSD.product_version: versions from v5.5 to before v5.15.86
GSD.description:
scsi: qla2xxx: Fix crash when I/O abort times out

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.86 by commit d3871af13aa03fbbe7fbb812eaf140501229a72e, it was introduced in version v5.5 by commit 71c80b75ce8f08c0978ce9a9816b81b5c3ce5e12. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: scsi: qla2xxx: Fix crash when I/O abort times out
